body_html:
I am new to committing and NN as well. So, with lowest confidence:

  1. PEP 357 - a good reason to refuse. (-1)
  2. Fixing the issue with tolist() would be user-friendly, I guess. (+1)
  3. , but still, it will not fix all the len(0-d) Errors, which doesn't seem so hard to pop up. (-1)

-1 in the end.
I have just started a topic at Pandas project. #21946

body:
I am new to committing and NN as well. So, with lowest confidence:
1. [PEP 357](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0357/) - a good reason to refuse. (-1)
2. Fixing the issue with **tolist()** would be user-friendly, I guess. (+1)
3. , but still, it will not fix all the **len(0-d)** Errors, which doesn't seem so hard to pop up. (-1)

-1 in the end.
I have just started a topic at Pandas project. [#21946](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/21946)
